## jx compliance logs

Prints the logs of compliance tests

### Synopsis

Prints the logs of compliance tests

```
jx compliance logs [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Print the compliance logs
  jx compliance logs
```

### Options

```
  -f, --follow   Specify if the logs should be streamed.
  -h, --help     help for logs
```
